column5: I'm thinking of just driving up for a few day's to get away. Possibly the Kenora area. Do you think I'll need reservations or is there a chance I'll find a motel room? I know most of the resorts will be full but I don't have to have a resort. Thanks for your help.

When???? I would say this weekend (July 1-4) would be the worst possible weekend of the year to try it without reservations. I'm not sure on the status of all the places, and certainly much of the rest of the year I would say no, you could probably find something without a reservation, BUT if you're considering it for this weekend, I would call ahead and make sure.

[font color=green size=3][b]What is your destination? Do a Canadian yellow page search on Motels, then make some calls. Not all camps are likely to be full either, I know several in the Perrault Falls area that likely would have openings. 5 days until I'll be fish'in on Wabby
